document_data.name: Dragon Beach
document_data.mainbody: '''Dragon Beach''' was the original harbor in [[Luskan]], and was an extremely lawless place.
document_data.Structure: The harbor was usually crammed with small boats, [[cog]]s and [[caravel]]s, and also pirate and merchant shipping.
document_data.History: The Dragon Beach served as the private harbor of the [[High Captains of Luskan]] until at least the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]], and was used by their naval, merchant, and pirate crews. Meanwhile, foreign ships were directed to [[Whitesails Harbor]]. By the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century DR, Dragon Beach had become more crowded and lawless.
document_data.Inhabitants: The location was dangerous unless Luskanite soldiers kept discipline which only happened during times of war.
